name: Rolling Revenge Of The Rolling Moon
name_original: Rolling Revenge Of The Rolling Moon
description:
Mr.Moon has had enough of Mr.Sun blocking him during the day,so Mr.Moon has decided to roll down to Earth to overthrow Mr.Sun,but Mr.Sun has placed traps in Mr.Moon's way.Can Mr.Moon roll down to Earth and defeat Mr.Sun?Music by vizze6.

http://flowlab.io/game/embed/290913

What's new in 1.1:

-Fixed bug where people could only jump in level 10!

What's coming in 1.2:

-A brand new 10 levels in part 2!

-A button in each level that allows you to save your progress!

-Possibly bug fixes?Tell me if you catch any!
